snippet: Charges against Karl Vanderwoude, a 26-year-old Brooklyn man, were dropped after he was wrongly accused of groping four women in a highly publicized case.
abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column; charges against 26-year-old Karl Vanderwoude of Brooklyn are dropped after he is cleared of accusations that he groped four women in Manhattan; highly publicized case raises questions of whether such cases of mistaken identity can be prevented and how best to protect the wrongly accused.
lead_paragraph: Charges against Karl Vanderwoude, a 26-year-old Brooklyn man, were dropped after he was wrongly accused of groping four women in a highly publicized case.

headline.seo: Karl Vanderwoude, Accused Groper, Cleared This Week
headline.main: Cleared, but Will the Next Person Be So Lucky?
headline.print_headline: Cleared, but Will the Next Person Be So Lucky?
